price: (Sε wo ne wo nkorͻfoͻ twa nsuo no wie a) gyae ͻpo a ayε dinn na emu akyekyε no, Nokorε sε, (Farao ne nenkorͻfoͻ) yε εdͻm a nsuo bεfa wͻn.
arabic: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'ruki al-baḥra rahwan innahum jundun mugh'raqūna
